basics.name: Katherine Milagros Pita Bustamante
basics.label: Obstetrician
basics.summary: Obstetrician graduated from the Faculty of Health Sciences at Antenor Orrego Private University, with skills and knowledge to work in the health field with commitment, dedication, and empathy. I have experience in primary care in reproductive and maternal perinatal health. I consider myself a person willing to learn and collaborate as a team to improve patient well-being, as well as contribute to the development of the institution and staff.

work.name: HOSPITAL BELÉN DE TRUJILLO
work.position: Obstetrician - Administrative management service in referrals and counter-referrals
work.summary:
● Responsible for digitizing referrals to more complex establishments.
● Support in coordinating with the national referral and counter-referral system managers for the acceptance and referral of 300 patients.
● Support in coordinating with the doctor responsible for each patient to be transferred.
● Update and provide respective information as required by the destination establishment.
● Support in managing humanitarian flights before the UDR for patient transfer.
● Support each doctor responsible for each patient to refer, consolidating the documents required by the destination IPRESS.
● Provide permanent information to doctors responsible for each patient with an emergency referral request and acceptance.
● Coordinate with the doctor and nurse for the provision of supplies and/or equipment for patient transfer.
● Inform the on-call doctor of the time and means of transport the patient will travel.
● Inform patients of the status of their referral.

work.name: SUB-REGIONAL HEALTH MANAGEMENT CUTERVO
work.summary:
● Coordination of referrals during obstetric emergencies.
● Coordination of obstetric counter-referrals of the Micronetwork.
● Manual referral registration and reporting.
● Monthly participation in the analysis of referrals and counter-referrals of Micronetwork users.
● Management of the referral and counter-referral system.
● Transfer of pregnant patients with referrals for emergencies, outpatient consultations, and diagnostic support.
● Responsible for the family planning program.
● Responsible for the adolescent program.
● Responsible for the young life program.
● Responsible for the MIS (family health).
● Support in the STI, HIV program.
● Support in the CACU program.
● Support in the sexual and reproductive health program.
● Prenatal care.
● Follow-up of high-risk pregnant women.
● Care of imminent deliveries.
● Care of uncomplicated deliveries.
● Support in training plans, supervisions, and comprehensive care.
● Support in emergencies and on-call shifts as needed, etc.

work.name: RED ASISTENCIAL LA LIBERTAD - ESSALUD
work.summary:
● Responsible for strategies: sexual and reproductive health, family planning, STIs, and cancer.
● Prenatal care.
● Follow-up of high-risk pregnant women.
● Comprehensive care for women in their reproductive stage.
● Administration of contraceptive methods.
● Guidance and counseling on sexual and reproductive health in adolescents.
● Diagnosis and treatment of STIs.
● Preventive-promotional activities for cervical cancer (Pap smear) and breast cancer (clinical breast exam).

research.name: Research Project
research.summary: Effects of cajau cajan seed “mountain bean” on the blood hemoglobin concentration of young oryctolagus cuniculus “rabbit” under UPAO clinical laboratory conditions 2019.
